languages.text: Империум не простил столь дерзкого отступления от уклада, диктуемого Святой Террой. Династия фон Валанциус была обвинена в богохульстве созидания собственной империи. Флот вторжения собирался в секторе Каликсис, и срок жизни, отпущенный молодой утопии, равнялся сроку жизни, отпущенному ее творцу.

The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.
languages.original_text: Империум не простил столь дерзкого отступления от уклада, диктуемого Святой Террой. Династия фон Валанциус была обвинена в богохульстве созидания собственной империи. Флот вторжения собирался в секторе Каликсис, и срок жизни, отпущенный молодой утопии, равнялся сроку жизни, отпущенному ее творцу.

traits.locale_text: The Imperium could not forgive such an insolent deviation from the order, prescribed by the Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of blasphemous formation of their own empire. The invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis sector, and the time allotted to the young utopia equalled the time allotted for its creator.

The Imperium could not forgive such an insolent deviation from the order, prescribed by the Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of blasphemous formation of their own empire. The invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis sector, and the time allotted to the young utopia equalled the time allotted for its creator.

The Imperium could not forgive such an insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

The Imperium could not forgive such an insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

languages.text: 然而，行商浪人的行为背离了神圣泰拉所规定的秩序，帝国无法原谅这样的恶行。帝国对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提出了指控，认为这个贸易王朝扰乱了帝国的正轨。入侵舰队在卡利西斯星区集结，这个年轻乌托邦的寿命，就像它创造者的寿命一样短暂。
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: 然而，行商浪人的行为背离了神圣泰拉所规定的秩序，帝国无法原谅这样的恶行。帝国对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提出了指控，认为这个贸易王朝扰乱了帝国的正规。入侵舰队在卡利西斯星区集结，这个年轻乌托邦的寿命，就像它创造者的寿命一样短暂。

languages.text: Eine solch dreiste Abweichung von der Ordnung, die durch das Heilige Terra vorgeschrieben war, konnte das Imperium nicht dulden. Der Dynastie von Valancius wurde vorgeworfen, auf abtrünnige Weise ein eigenes Imperium gegründet zu haben. Eine Invasionsflotte versammelte sich im Calixis-Sektor, und die Lebensspanne der jungen Utopie war so kurz wie die {mf|ihres Schöpfers|ihrer Schöpferin}.
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: Eine solch dreiste Abweichung von der Ordnung, die durch das Heilige Terra vorgeschrieben war, konnte das Imperium nicht dulden. Der Dynastie von Valancius wurde vorgeworfen, auf abtrünnige Weise ein eigenes Imperium gegründet zu haben. Eine Invasionsflotte versammelte sich im Calixis-Sektor, und die Lebensspanne der jungen Utopie war so kurz wie die {mf|ihres Schöpfers|ihrer Schöpferin}.

languages.text: L'Imperium ne pouvait pardonner une déviation aussi insolente de l'ordre prescrit par la Sainte Terra. La dynastie von Valancius fut accusée de vouloir former séditieusement son propre empire. Une flotte d'invasion se massa dans le secteur Calixis l'existence de la jeune utopie prit fin aussi vite que celle de {mf|son fondateur|sa fondatrice}.
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: L'Imperium ne pouvait pardonner une déviation aussi insolente de l'ordre prescrit par la Sainte Terra. La dynastie von Valancius fut accusée de vouloir former séditieusement son propre empire. Une flotte d'invasion se massa dans le secteur Calixis l’existence de la jeune utopie prit fin aussi vite que celle de {mf|son fondateur|sa fondatrice}.

languages.text: El Imperium no podía tolerar una desviación tan insolente del orden marcado por la Sagrada Terra. La dinastía von Valancius fue acusada de sedición al formar su propio imperio. Se congregó una flota invasora en el sector Calixis, y la joven utopía fue tan efímera como la vida de su creador{mf||a}.
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: El Imperium no podía tolerar una desviación tan insolente del orden marcado por la Sagrada Terra. La dinastía von Valancius fue acusada de sedición al formar su propio imperio. Se congregó una flota invasora en el sector Calixis, y la joven utopía fue tan efímera como la vida de su creador{mf||a}.

languages.text: 帝国は、聖なる地球が定めた秩序を逸脱するこのような横暴を許すことはできなかった。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝は、自分たちの帝国を扇動的に形成したとして非難された。侵略艦隊がキャリクシス星域に集結し、若いユートピアの寿命はその創造者と同じくらい短かった。
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: 帝国は、聖なる地球が定めた秩序を逸脱するこのような横暴を許すことはできなかった。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝は、自分たちの帝国を扇動的に形成したとして非難された。侵略艦隊がキャリクシス星域に集結し、若いユートピアの寿命はその創造者と同じくらい短かった。

languages.text: İmparatorluk, Kutsal Terra tarafından verilmiş emirlerin böylesine küstahça bir kenara bırakılmasını affedemezdi. Von Valancius hanedanlığı, kendi imparatorluğu tarafından, isyancı bir oluşuma dönüşmekle itham edildi. Calixis Sektörü'nde bir istila filosu toplandı ve emekleme dönemindeki ütopyanın yaşamı, yaratıcısınınki kadar kısa oldu.
languages.original_text: The Imperium could not forgive such insolent deviation from the order prescribed by Holy Terra. The von Valancius dynasty was accused of the seditious formation of their own empire. An invasion fleet gathered in the Calixis Sector, and the lifespan of the young utopia was as short as its creator's.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk, Kutsal Terra tarafından verilmiş emirlerin böylesine küstahça bir kenara bırakılmasını affedemezdi. Von Valancius hanedanlığı, kendi imparatorluğu tarafından, isyancı bir oluşuma dönüşmekle itham edildi. Calixis Sektörü'nde bir istila filosu toplandı ve emekleme dönemindeki ütopyanın yaşamı, yaratıcısınınki kadar kısa oldu.
